lines.text: Just for once could the skunk NOT talk?!
I'd hate to think Eric Stoltz was mad at me.
How did you know it was me? Could you tell I was knocking out my name in morse code?
[RILEY has spent three months' rent on dope]
Actually, I didn't DO any thing. It was an inaction.
You always barge in on people and profess your love?
You just listened to me mentally puke

I'm just trying to figure out what the rules are. I mean, maybe this is the greatest love that ever existed on this planet. In history. Why does it have to be someone else? Why can't it be us? Just because we're US why does that mean we're excluded from that? Everyone's so cynical and scared to go out on a limb that we don't go anywhere^Åscrew it. I'll die for you. How's that? You wanna couch that in some psycho-babble? What? It's co-dependant or unhealthy. Go ahead and protect yourself. I dare you. I dare you to protect yourself^ÅI'm here. I am here.
What if, the movie took place in a world where the ice cream man DID NOT have a skunk who talks?

[swearing in Russian]
Blyad. Someone has called the cops.
